channel.title: The most annoying thing about noobs is
channel.description: I think saffers tick me of the most ! :mad: :mad:

item.title: The most annoying thing about noobs is
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

Tr3v0r:

I think that “safing” is not bad. What’s the pking…? To kill the other person without die’ing I don’t think its noobish to keep your hp up high. If you don’t youll just get koed with spec.

Exactly.

Calling someone a ‘safer’ is an excuses to get mad at them for not letting you kill them with ease, Get over it.

Read full topic
item.source: The most annoying thing about noobs is

@tr3v0r wrote:

xxlegitxx:

Wow. It’s a safer, not a saffer. And I hate noobs who make threads/polls about how much they hate noobs.

item.title: The most annoying thing about noobs is
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

I think autoers are what piss me of the most. Especially when i’m trying to cut yews and such. they make the tree disappear in like a second.

Read full topic
item.source: The most annoying thing about noobs is

item.title: The most annoying thing about noobs is
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:10, topic:123783”][quote author=MastrChief link=topic=173596.msg1601138#msg1601138 date=1184591333]
I hate it when I’m buying/selling and somebody says “offer” and when I do, they run of laughing. You said offer, so I did. If you know you’re going to decline it, just fucking tell me how much you want for it.
[/quote]

i know right? how stupid are people now? i think when they tell you to offer they think that is the max your going to put up or something… i mean i had 34m cash in my inentory and i was buying 3k deaths and i offered 290 ea… they could have just said 300 ea instead of offer…[/quote]

The best way is to say “I don’t Offer”, and if they were that desperate to sell, they would give you a price. But alot of people usually say offer because they don’t know the price in the first place.

Read full topic
item.source: The most annoying thing about noobs is

i know right? how stupid are people now? i think when they tell you to offer they think that is the max your going to put up or something… i mean i had 34m cash in my inentory and i was buying 3k deaths and i offered 290 ea… they could have just said 300 ea instead of offer…
